item.author: Niklas Meyer
item.description: Introduction Moohoo everyone! To end the chaotic year 2022 in a worthy manner, the time has finally come. The long awaited Bootstrap 5 update is finally here! As already mentioned in some posts, this update marks only the turning point of the mailcow UI, because the new base (Bootstrap 5) will offer us many new possibilities and scope for new features in the future. Because of the Bootstrap update the old UI was completely renewed and ported to the new version.
